code: import{SET_CHOSEN_SUBJECT,UNSET_CHOSEN_SUBJECT}from"../actions/action-type";export function chosenSubjectReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_CHOSEN_SUBJECT:{return state.concat([action.payLoad]);}case UNSET_CHOSEN_SUBJECT:{return state=state.filter(function(s){return!(s._id===action.payLoad._id);});}default:return state;}}export default chosenSubjectReducer;
